level.text: The owner or operator of each budget source shall retain records of all measurements, data, reports, and other information required by this Chapter for a period of at least five (5) years.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: As amended by final rulemaking published at 47 DCR 8646(October 10, 2000); as amended by final rulemaking published at 47 DCR 9686 (December 8, 2000).
